SAT 27 MAR 2010

£40,000 guaranteed For 3yo+ Weights 3yo colts and geldings 8st 3lb; fillies 7st 12lb; 4yo+ colts and geldings 9st 2lb; fillies 8st 11lb Penalties after May 31st, 2009, a winner of a Listed race 3lb; of a Group 3 race 5lb; of a Group 1 or Group 2 race 10lb Weight for age 3 from 4yo+ 13lb Entries 19 pay £ 200 Penalty value 1st £22,708.00 2nd £8,608.00 3rd £4,308.00 4th £2,148.00 5th £1,076.00 6th £540.00

Our expert's view of the main contenders and likely winner of the race. Part of RACINGPOST.com Members' Club

This trip may just stretch the stamina of the Nicholls pair Tax Free and Inxile, but 6f in this sort of ground could prove just the ticket for REDFORD who ran well on his debut for Kevin Ryan at Wolverhampton and may be poised to finally fulfil his potential.
